subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Long before he learned to skate, Patrick Kane appeared on a hockey poster. If Kane, a Chicago Blackhawks rookie, keeps playing the way he has, he will wind up on more posters.
snippet: Long before he learned to skate, Patrick Kane appeared on a hockey poster. If Kane, a Chicago Blackhawks rookie, keeps playing the way he has, he will wind up on more posters.
